text: Ricardo Vela or also known as Ricky Vela was a songwriter and keyboardist for Selena y Los Dinos. Vela had won several awards at the Tejano Music Awards for his works with Selena. == Charted songs == (This is a list of songs written or co-written by Ricky Vela that impacted music charts on Billboard) *"Dame Tu Amor" #6 Hot Latin Tracks *"No Debes Jugar" #3 Hot Latin TracksSelena - Music Sales Information. Selenaforever.com. *"La Llamada" #6 Hot Latin Tracks *"Tu Robaste Mi Corazon" #5 Hot Latin Tracks *"No Me Queda Mas" #1 Hot Latin Tracks *"Fotos y Recuerdos" #1 Hot Latin Tracks == References == Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Selena Category:American songwriters Category:Tejano musicians
title: Ricky Vela
